q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that use **Cotton Fabric**:

| Cutting Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group Name | Order Product ID |
|-----------------|---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|------------------|
| 1               | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-18 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 1                |
| 2               | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 2                |
| 3               | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-19 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 3                |
| 4               | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-17 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 4                |
| 5               | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 5                |
| 19              | 2024-03-18 00:00:00 | 2024-04-12 00:00:00 | Expert Cutters     | 19               |
| 21              | 2024-03-18 00:00:00 | 2024-04-04 00:00:00 | Expert Cutters     | 21               |
| 28              | 2024-04-19 00:00:00 | 2024-05-12 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 28               |
| 31              | 2024-05-10 00:00:00 | 2024-05-26 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 31               |
| 34              | 2024-06-30 00:00:00 | 2024-07-10 00:00:00 | Expert Cutters     | 34               |

These tasks are handled by various skilled groups, including the Master Sewers, Master Cutters, and Expert Cutters. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN (SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '1');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that use the material "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 19, 21, 28, 31, 34);
steps.description: Retrieve the details of the cutting tasks that use "Cotton Fabric"
